text: Moses ua kamaghɨn Israelia mɨgei, “O Israelia, ia oragh. Kɨ ian azai, ia Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian God ifongezir arazir aghuir manaba ia dar amuam? Arazir kaba: Ia Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian Godɨn atiatingɨva an apengara ikɨ, egh an akaba bar dar gɨn mangɨ. Egh a gifuegh, egh bar uan navir averiaba ko duaba sara bar akongegh an ingangarim damu.
